message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but $9,000 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,500, but that's my final offer.  Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $9,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,200 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but I'm not able to go any lower than $9,400. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let me know if you're able to reach this point.
I understand your perspective, but $9,400 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you reconsider?
